name: Beyond Vision
description:
Beyond Vision

Controls 

  • Read quick intro on main menu screen: i
  • Help: h
  • Start game / Advance turn: space
  • Toggle Cast trap spell during battle: q w e a d z x c
    • Imagine the player's position is at 's' on the keyboard
    • These keys are the grid positions around the player
    • Above player: q w e
    • Right / left: a d
    • Below Player: z x c

Quick Introduction

Welcome to Beyond Vision, the game made for NOKIA 3310 JAM 3.

Before heading out to the dark world, you must complete the simulated training. The battle is turn-based and you will use your mana points to cast trap spells on the ground to catch enemies.

  • Before each battle starts, your blindfold will be OFF. You can see the enemy and their predicted movement pattern.
  • When battle beings, your blindfold will be on and will no longer be able to see the enemies. Use your memory and senses to anticipate the enemy's approach.

Technology

  • Game Engine: Unity
  • Art: GIMP
  • Music & SFX: [modified] nokia3310-soundpack by trix
